title: Coinbase, Tesla, DoorDash: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Coinbase tumbled more than 9% premarket after the crypto company posted third-quarter revenue that missed analysts’ targets
body:
U.S. stock futures edged lower, and fresh data showed that U.S. inflation hit a three-decade high last month. Here’s what we’re watching for in Wednesday’s trading session:
Write to Caitlin Ostroff at caitlin.ostroff@wsj.com
